sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-registration', templateUrl: './registration.component.html', styleUrls: ['./registration.component.less'] }) export class RegistrationComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } firstName: string = ''; lastName: string = ''; register(){ const first = this.firstName; const last = this.lastName; console.log("full name is: " + first + " " + last) } } Bootstrap Example
